about_the_game:
●Synopsis

You are finished and the protagonist comes home, tired, and falls asleep.

You wake up in the middle of the night and as you do the housework, you feel “something”.

●Play time

Approx. 15 - 20 min.

●Game Information

  • It is produced to provide an experience similar to that of a short horror video from overseas.

  • This title focuses on graphics, allowing the player to become more immersed in the game.

  • The game is a first-person walking simulator game.

  • Players will experience several terrifying experiences as they explore the house to complete their chores.

  • You will experience a sense of dread as if there is always someone else in the house.

  • Volume, mouse sensitivity, and language can be set in the title.

●Other Information

This is the first work by a Japanese student who has been studying game production for six months.

Inspired by foreign indie horror games, this game was created with the hope that even those who are not good at horror and those who are not confident in their playing skills can play this game.
